tool_description: Covid-19 case count and death data for every country in the world. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/covid19.
name: Covid-19 by API-Ninjas
title: Covid-19 by API-Ninjas

api_list.name: /v1/covid19
api_list.description: API Ninjas Covid19 API endpoint. Either **date** or **country** must be set.

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: type of data to retrieve. Must be either cases or deaths. If not set, cases will be used by default.

optional_parameters.name: date
optional_parameters.description: date to retrieve single-day snapshot. Must be in the form of YYYY-MM-DD (e.g. 2022-01-01)

optional_parameters.name: county
optional_parameters.description: county name for US states (case insensitive). For United States data only. Must be used in conjunction with country (United States) and region (e.g. California).

optional_parameters.name: region
optional_parameters.description: administrative region (also known as state or province in many countries) name (case insensitive). Must be used in conjunction with country. If not set, countries with data broken down by administrative regions will return separate data for each region.
